feed.title: CityCamp
feed.subtitle: CityCamp is a global movement of community-focused events that foster civic collaboration and innovation.

entry.title: We’re back
entry.content:
Folks in a number of cities have expressed an interest in organizing a CityCamp where they live.

We’re just getting re-situated, but here’s how to engage:

  • Join the community (Slack)
  • Connect
entry.summary: Getting re-situated. Here's how to engage.
